name: ExpanSnake
description:
A short 3D platform game for SolocodeJam-5 (Expanse)

A tribute to Snake Rattle 'n' Roll by Rare Software

Eat balls to make your snake big enough to open the exit door.

Hurry up !

Controls :

Move : (QZD or KOM or Arrows Keys) + Mouse

Jump : SPACE or Right Mouse Button

Eat / Attack :Left Mouse Button

Zoom In / Out : Mouse wheel
